Docs.summary: A flow-based layout for use with s.

remarks.para: s allow content to be displayed using arbitrary layouts. The provides an easy-to-use flow-based layout.

The lays out s side-by-side, either horizontally or vertically. Component s wrap at the boundaries. Cells are spaced in the direction of layout according to the property and rows (whether horizontal or vertical) are separated based on the property.
The application developer can use various methods of to modify the exact spacing and size of cells within a .
